name: Knuckle Sandwich (itch)
description:
A retro style beat-em up where you play as a sandwich artist named Tony. But these aren't regular sandwiches. The ingredients fight back! 

Smash your way to happy customers by punching, bopping (sold separately) and slapping (sold separately) every ingredient that stands in your way. 

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys to Move

J to Light Attack

K to Heavy Attack 

Alt-F4 to Touch Grass

~ Made for Game Off 2022 ~
